channel.title: Jen Dewalt / @JenniferDewalt
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @JenniferDewalt. Generated by nitter.net

item.title:
RT by @JenniferDewalt: I fucking live for unhinged Victorian Christmas cards. Some years I just share the terror with friends, and others I choose to spread the chaos. This year I pick the latter.
Let’s start with the truly inexplicable.
Frog + beetle waltz Sky jellyfish Mutant beet-man GOAT 🧵
item.dc:creator: @LaurynIpsum

description.p:
I fucking live for unhinged Victorian Christmas cards. Some years I just share the terror with friends, and others I choose to spread the chaos. This year I pick the latter.
Let’s start with the truly inexplicable.
Frog + beetle waltz Sky jellyfish Mutant beet-man GOAT 🧵

item.title:
RT by @JenniferDewalt: I think everyone could use a lighthearted/happy story right now so here goes:
At the beginning of the pandemic I went through some painful personal stuff and would often go out at night for long walks because no one was around and I couldn’t sleep anyway. One night I was walking
item.dc:creator: @saysthefox

description.p:
I think everyone could use a lighthearted/happy story right now so here goes:
At the beginning of the pandemic I went through some painful personal stuff and would often go out at night for long walks because no one was around and I couldn’t sleep anyway. One night I was walking

item.title: RT by @JenniferDewalt: Dear Founders: A great way to make your fundraising deck awesome is to avoid these things VCs hate > 1. Set-up sequence that is too long. (2-3 slides max.) 2. No traction info. 3. Walls of text. 4. Top down conceptual TAMs 5. Pages about advisors. 6. Not showing the product.
item.dc:creator: @RMB

description.p: Dear Founders: A great way to make your fundraising deck awesome is to avoid these things VCs hate > 1. Set-up sequence that is too long. (2-3 slides max.) 2. No traction info. 3. Walls of text. 4. Top down conceptual TAMs 5. Pages about advisors. 6. Not showing the product.

item.title: RT by @JenniferDewalt: Every team has that one issue that everyone avoids
item.dc:creator: @cassidoo

description.p: Every team has that one issue that everyone avoids

item.title:
RT by @JenniferDewalt: We're now accepting applications for our Winter 2021 Accelerator! B2B SaaS founders in NYC, SF, TO, and beyond, if you’re looking for a small hands-on program, personalized mentorship, a supportive community, and experts to help you grow, apply today!
https://buff.ly/344ZxF1
item.dc:creator: @forumventures

description.p:
We're now accepting applications for our Winter 2021 Accelerator! B2B SaaS founders in NYC, SF, TO, and beyond, if you’re looking for a small hands-on program, personalized mentorship, a supportive community, and experts to help you grow, apply today!
buff.ly/344ZxF1

item.title:
RT by @JenniferDewalt: I get rubbed the wrong way seeing all these twitter VC invitations for black founders to chat
Appreciate the motion, but i'm highly skeptical that it will lead to actual funding
It's opportunistic & it will all disappear in a few weeks. Do something for the long term instead 💰
item.dc:creator: @sudotong

description.p:
I get rubbed the wrong way seeing all these twitter VC invitations for black founders to chat
Appreciate the motion, but i'm highly skeptical that it will lead to actual funding
It's opportunistic & it will all disappear in a few weeks. Do something for the long term instead 💰

item.title: RT by @JenniferDewalt: This is the best weather forecast in the history of television news
item.dc:creator: @AndrewFeinberg

description.p: This is the best weather forecast in the history of television news

item.title: RT by @JenniferDewalt: DO NOT APOLOGISE WHEN YOUR PETS JUMP INTO THE FRAME ON ZOOM CALLS. Was just in a conference with the CEOs of a major US org and Muffin jumped on my lap and the whole conversation stopped, IS THAT A CAT, SHOW ME THE CAT! Everyone needs cats in these trying times.
item.dc:creator: @ruzkin

description.p: DO NOT APOLOGISE WHEN YOUR PETS JUMP INTO THE FRAME ON ZOOM CALLS. Was just in a conference with the CEOs of a major US org and Muffin jumped on my lap and the whole conversation stopped, IS THAT A CAT, SHOW ME THE CAT! Everyone needs cats in these trying times.

item.title: RT by @JenniferDewalt: TODAY’S ART LESSON: scavenger hunt color wheel! Find objects around your house. Compete with friends and classmates to find the most things. When you’re done, pick a few objects and make a still life drawing. Make it weird! Keep drawing!
item.dc:creator: @amymoneill

description.p: TODAY’S ART LESSON: scavenger hunt color wheel! Find objects around your house. Compete with friends and classmates to find the most things. When you’re done, pick a few objects and make a still life drawing. Make it weird! Keep drawing!

item.title: RT by @JenniferDewalt: If you’ve been spending a lot of time on Zoom calls in the last few weeks, maybe you’ve gotten sick of seeing your walls in the background like I have. I made a site of better Zoom virtual backgrounds for you: https://teleport.fm
item.dc:creator: @moustache

description.p: If you’ve been spending a lot of time on Zoom calls in the last few weeks, maybe you’ve gotten sick of seeing your walls in the background like I have. I made a site of better Zoom virtual backgrounds for you: teleport.fm

item.title:
RT by @JenniferDewalt: what we are all experiencing now is not normal remote working.
we are in a pandemic. many have children at home. we are in a pandemic. many cannot leave their homes. we are in a pandemic. everyone is distracted at some level.
remember that when forming new beliefs about wfh.
item.dc:creator: @EricaJoy

description.p:
what we are all experiencing now is not normal remote working.
we are in a pandemic. many have children at home. we are in a pandemic. many cannot leave their homes. we are in a pandemic. everyone is distracted at some level.
remember that when forming new beliefs about wfh.

item.title:
RT by @JenniferDewalt: I've been using this terminal app called thefuck for years and it still cracks me up because I'm 12. It corrects errors in previous console commands. So if you type the wrong thing, you just say 'fuck' and it gives you what you probably meant.
https://github.com/nvbn/thefuck
item.dc:creator: @sarah_edo

description.p:
I've been using this terminal app called thefuck for years and it still cracks me up because I'm 12. It corrects errors in previous console commands. So if you type the wrong thing, you just say 'fuck' and it gives you what you probably meant.
github.com/nvbn/thefuck

item.title: RT by @JenniferDewalt: She is talking about me! I can try non-traditional roles, all I want is to have a chance. I'm looking for any Entry or Jr. Software developer position!
item.dc:creator: @YoungSongJS

description.p:
She is talking about me! I can try non-traditional roles, all I want is to have a chance. I'm looking for any Entry or Jr. Software developer position!

item.title: RT by @JenniferDewalt: Did not expect to be emotionally gutted by a utility pole this morning
item.dc:creator: @BradfordPearson

description.p: Did not expect to be emotionally gutted by a utility pole this morning

item.title:
RT by @JenniferDewalt: STOP making fun of different programming languages
C is FAST
Java is POPULAR
Ruby is COOL
Python is BEAUTIFUL
Javascript
Haskell is INTRIGUING
item.dc:creator: @cszhu

description.p:
STOP making fun of different programming languages
C is FAST
Java is POPULAR
Ruby is COOL
Python is BEAUTIFUL
Javascript
Haskell is INTRIGUING

item.title:
RT by @JenniferDewalt: You know when you’re so devastated something you wanted didn’t work out and then later you learn more and you’re like, “THANK FUCK I DODGED THAT BULLET”?
Sometimes you have to trust that the universe is working in your favor even when it hurts.
item.dc:creator: @TheBloggess

description.p:
You know when you’re so devastated something you wanted didn’t work out and then later you learn more and you’re like, “THANK FUCK I DODGED THAT BULLET”?
Sometimes you have to trust that the universe is working in your favor even when it hurts.

item.title: RT by @JenniferDewalt: [Thread] My boss made a comment today along the line of "I don't get how women can complain about how they get treated when they do shit like this." I turned around and to see what he was talking about, and he was looking at a thumbnail of a profile pic of a woman on LinkedIn.
item.dc:creator: @gonesince022021

description.p: [Thread] My boss made a comment today along the line of "I don't get how women can complain about how they get treated when they do shit like this." I turned around and to see what he was talking about, and he was looking at a thumbnail of a profile pic of a woman on LinkedIn.
